name: app
description: A minimal client/server to interact with a GraphQL API

scripts.initDb: if  ls -1qA $PWD/server/data | grep -q .; then pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data start; else pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data initdb && pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data start && createdb && psql -f $PWD/server/mydb.sql; fi; redis-server &
scripts.dev: trap "echo Shutting down database " SIGINT; concurrently "NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --open" "NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch server --watch ../library --experimental-specifier-resolution=node server/server.js"
scripts.start: trap "echo Shutting down database " INT; node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node server/server.js; exit 0
